title: PizzaCoin (PIZZA) Market Capitalization Hits $235.00
content: PizzaCoin (CURRENCY:PIZZA) traded flat against the U.S. dollar during the 24 hour period ending at 17:00 PM Eastern on June 2nd. One PizzaCoin coin can currently be purchased for $0.0002 or 0.00000002 BTC on popular exchanges. In the last week, PizzaCoin has traded down 25.6% against the U.S. dollar. PizzaCoin has a total market capitalization of $235.00 and $0.00 worth of PizzaCoin was traded on exchanges in the last day.    Here is how other cryptocurrencies have performed in the last day:    Pura (PURA) traded 12.9% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.13 or 0.00001724 BTC.  Polis (POLIS) traded 3.2% higher against the dollar and now trades at $4.87 or 0.00063881 BTC.  DigitalPrice (DP) traded 9.7% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0711 or 0.00000933 BTC.  Onix (ONX) traded up 0.4% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0101 or 0.00000132 BTC.  ArcticCoin (ARC) traded 12.8% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.0422 or 0.00000513 BTC.  Advanced Technology Coin (ARC) traded up 4.6% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0364 or 0.00000477 BTC.  Adzcoin (ADZ) traded 12.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0188 or 0.00000246 BTC.  Startcoin (START) traded down 11.6% against the dollar and now trades at $0.0133 or 0.00000174 BTC.  Prime-XI (PXI) traded 0.9% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.0072 or 0.00000094 BTC.  Uro (URO) traded flat against the dollar and now trades at $0.0322 or 0.00000439 BTC.   About PizzaCoin     PizzaCoin (PIZZA) is a proof-of-work (PoW) coin that uses the X11 hashing algorithm. Its genesis date was August 18th, 2016. PizzaCoin’s total supply is 10,127,917 coins and its circulating supply is 1,377,917 coins. The official website for PizzaCoin is pizzacoin.net .  Buying and Selling PizzaCoin    PizzaCoin can be purchased on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: . It is usually not presently possible to buy alternative cryptocurrencies such as PizzaCoin directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to trade PizzaCoin should first buy Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Gemini, Changelly or GDAX. Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to buy PizzaCoin using one of the aforementioned exchanges.
